Title: MP2 Metro
Description: MP2 Metro Skin is a skin designed for MediaPortal 2.  The skin is based on the new windows 8 metro UI.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

MP2 Metro is a skin for MediaPortal 2 (MP2), both the new skin and MP2 are still under development.
The main inspiration behind the skin is the newly released videos of windows 8 with its revamped metro ui design.

Some of the basic windows 8 concepts that can relate to MP2 are:
- Active home screen with “Live Tiles”
- Full screen content for apps (ie plugins in this case)
- Easy navigation
- Quick response

Some of the MP2 concepts that need to be added and/or followed are:
- Easy navigation for remote (ie MCE remote control)
- 10 Foot user interface design
